definition: plate/dish/tray/board/hard drive (computing)/to build/to coil/to check/to examine/to transfer (property)/to make over/classifier for food: dish, helping/to coil/classifier for coils of wire/classifier for games of chess

sentences.english: The few enormously rich battened on the poor.
sentences.chinese: 爲數不多的富豪盤剝窮人，養肥自己。

sentences.english: Slinky is like a child, and you don't exploit your child.
sentences.chinese: 斯林克就像一個孩子，你不會盤剝你的孩子。

sentences.english: This will inevitably suck resources from elsewhere in the health service.
sentences.chinese: 這種作法無疑將會盤剝公共醫療部門中其他的資源。
